title: Tetori Ashitori Oshiete Yaru yo
original_name: 手とり足とり教えてやるよ
sinopse:
Out of the blue, the plain high schooler Misaki's heart is crushed when her boyfriend breaks up with her. Misaki is about to resign to her fate, considering herself boring and bland, when she meets a handsome guy who will turn her life around.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
